commit.message:
re PR objc/31281 (ICE on ObjC try-catch blocks with next runtime)

	PR 31281
	* objc/objc-act.c (next_sjlj_build_catch_list): Delete volatile from rethrow decl.
	* testsuite/objc/execute/exceptions/pr31281.m: New.

From-SVN: r123501

files.patch:

+	PR 31281
+	* objc/objc-act.c (next_sjlj_build_catch_list): Delete volatile from rethrow decl.
+
